DOC.brief_summary: The Major goals of this project was to assess the natural history of disease in chronic hepatitis C patients with normal ALT and to determine the virologic and host factors associated with disease severity.
DOC.brief_title: Natural History of Hepatitis C in Patients With Normal Liver Tests
DOC.criteria: Patients with chronic hepatitis C and persistently normal liver enzymes able to give consent decompensated liver disease any prior antiviral or immunosuppressive therapy other liver disease besides hepatitis C
